english.segment1: Where the angels see. You are praised as You should be. But how can I express. My yearning for Your Holiness. May it be (that)
english.segment2: CHORUS: I will open my heart. Search me in the deepest part. And I will stand in cleansing fire, By You, purified, By You I'm purified.
english.segment3: Savior of my soul. To your strength I yield control. Purge me of my stain. Sin will lose it's mortal reign. Make me free (and)
english.segment5: BRIDGE: You are Holy. You are Holy. Yes You are Holy. You are Holy. You are Holy. Holy
